changes.change: Quick fix to show the status bar in the control center.
Removed the regular status bar visible in apps while launching them.
Fixed a bug where the corner radius wasn’t applied while the device was locked.
Fixed a bug where the status bar could reappear in a disabled application.
Fixed issues when the device was locked.
Added an option to change the notch cover corner radius (requested on reddit).
Fixed a notification center bug in landscape mode.
Allow gestures in the status bar such as tap to scroll to top.
Fixed a bug where a disabled app would still have noNotch.
Fixed a bug where the notch cover would cover the camera app on the lockscreen.

Partially fixed an annoying issue where the status bar and notch cover wouldn’t be there while the device was locked. This would cause a “flash” when unlocking the device. Now, only the status bar is gone while the device is locked, getting rid of the “flash”.
